original_text: The rich man's wealth is his strong city, and as an high wall in his own conceit.
korean_text: 부자의 재물은 그의 견고한 성이라 그가 높은 성벽 같이 여기느니라

sentences.original_text: The rich man's wealth is his strong city
and as an high wall in his own conceit
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신의 생각 속에 높은 벽과 같다
